reviews.text: I've become a fan of Northstar Cafe after finally visiting in person after yearing about it for years. This location can have tricky parking during lunch...
I would definitely come back again! Everyone was very kind - and the seating areas are very cozy and perfect for a meeting or study session! The sandwich...
We love coming here. I've done amazing reviews on Northstar before, but this was the first time I had their cauliflower soup. It did not disappoint....
